column2: an A.M. Eatery////My hubby ordered the Benny Duo
column3: so you'll have to check his page for the review on his breakfast. Just a little note
column4: he didn't leave much on his plate. I ordered the shrimp and grits. The homestyle cheesy grits were loaded with sautéed shrimp
column7: leeks and topped with a sunny side up egg. The dish was good. However
column8: I wasn't feeling that egg sitting on top of my entrée. I politely removed it.
